title: River Course With Dr. Joe Tafur
sitename: All-Inclusive Ayahuasca Costa Rica Retreats | Authentic Shipibo Ayahuasca Retreats located in Costa Rica. Spiritual healing at it's best, offering meditation, yoga, exercise and plant medicine ceremonies.
cleaned_text: For the last decade, family physician Dr. Joe Tafur, author of The Fellowship of the River, has been exploring the role of spiritual healing in modern healthcare. The Soltara team caught up with him at the recent conference in Mexico, Plantas Sagradas en las Américas. In the talk below, we discuss the connection between the mental, emotional, physical, and spiritual bodies, and how plant medicine in sacred ceremony can, from both a shamanic and scientific perspective, facilitating deep healing on all levels. Join us for a special retreat with Dr. Tafur, July 29 - Aug 5, 2018 at Soltara Healing Center [Learn More](https://soltara.co/programs/193/river-course-with-dr-joe-tafur-md/) Dr. Tafur will be our special guest at Soltara for a week of integrative medicine work and deep spiritual healing.
